actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: Joint resolution to authorize the designation of the 7-day period beginning June 21,1976, and ending June 27, 1976, as National Amateur Radio Week.

summary.text: Authorizes and requests the President to issue a proclamation designating the seven-day period beginning June 21, 1976, and ending June 27, 1976, as National Amateur Radio Week.

titles.title: Joint resolution to authorize the designation of the 7-day period beginning June 21,1976, and ending June 27, 1976, as National Amateur Radio Week.
